question.title: Is the database getting a hit from PLP i.e. category page?
question.body:
From what I know the database should never be hit from the category page or PLP.

However, I have found a trail that is doing exactly that !

DefaultCategoryService#getCategoryForCode
CommerceCategoryFacetDisplayNameProvider.java:158
CommerceCategoryFacetDisplayNameProvider.java:87
SearchResponseBreadcrumbsPopulator.java:74
commerceSolrSearchResponseConverter
DefaultSolrProductSearchService

How is this even possible? This is causing the error of missing categories.
